hymn.title: Living Christ is by loving Him

lyrics.stanza: Saints, if we do not love Christ Then we surely cannot live Him. Loving Him is the best way To concentrate our being on Him. (Repeat)
Living Christ is by loving Him, Living Christ is by loving Him, Living Christ is by loving Him, To concentrate our being on Him. (Repeat)
Loving Christ to the uttermost And taking Him, saints, as our foremost. Let's occupy our entire being, Yes, absolutely on Him. (Repeat)
Loving Christ to the uttermost, Taking Him as your foremost. Living Christ is by loving Him, Lord, wholly occupy my being.
Loving Christ to the uttermost, Taking Him as your foremost. Living Christ is by loving Him, Lord, wholly occupy my entire being.
